nodes.name: ProxyCreated
createProxy
createProxyAndCall

createProxy(address,address).details: Creates an upgradeability proxy with an initial implementation.

createProxyAndCall(address,address,bytes.details: Creates an upgradeability proxy with an initial implementation and calls it. This is useful to initialize the proxied contract.

params.data: Data to send as msg.data in the low level call. It should include the signature and the parameters of the function to be called, as described in https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/develop/abi-spec.html#function-selector-and-argument-encoding.
